author: Chris Davie
title: Footballer thanks wife AND girlfriend during interview after winning man of the match
text:
Mohammed Anas’ man-of-the-match interview didn’t go to plan. (Twitter/@clydegoal) One footballer may have some explaining to do after revealing a bit too much in his post-match interview.
Things were looking good for Mohammed Anas after he scored twice for Free State Stars in their 2-2 draw with Ajax Cape Town on Friday.
The Ghanian striker was named man of the match for his performance, but in his interview after the game, he accidentally paid tribute to his wife and his girlfriend before quickly realising his error.
‘Thank you for this, I appreciate my fans. My wife and my girlfriend… I mean my wife, sorry.’ he said.
‘I’m so sorry… I love you so much, I love you so much from my heart!’
